text: Except for vehicles removed after traffic accidents, the Department may, without further notice, dispose of a dangerous vehicle or abandoned vehicle removed from the public space or private property pursuant to any District law or regulation if the vehicle does not display a valid vehicle identification number and recognizable registration.
historical:

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)

subtitle.text: Vehicles on Public and Private Space.

subchapter.text: Removal and Disposition of Abandoned and Other Unlawfully Parked Vehicles.

heading.catch_text: Post-removal disposition of certain vehicles without further notice.
